name: Water Adventure Slide Rush
description:
🏊 Avoid obstacles in the water adventure sprint, collect gold coins and props, slide and rush to get a higher score!

Realistic 3D graphics, simulate real water slides, and experience exciting water adventures!

Switching from a dual perspective will give you an immersive experience and appreciate the high-altitude dive.

Game play:
Tilting the phone to control the movement of the character from left to right seems simple, but it is not so simple to get high scores. You need to keep collecting coins.
🎇 Rich game rewards:
Log in to the game for daily rewards, and continue online to receive online rewards, achievements, and rare gems.
🎇 Multiple game props:
You can buy and upgrade characters and water slides, and you can also purchase bonus items before you start to help you get higher scores on the water slide.

Game features:
🎇 2 exciting game modes:
Level challenge mode, 40 water slide missions waiting for you to conquer, complete the task to get rich gold coins and gems rewards, to achieve task challenges can get a higher star rating;
Special mode, special mode includes endless mode, gold coin limited time challenge, gemstone limited time challenge.
🎇 A variety of styles of water slides:
Classic track, ice sculpture track, gold track, wooden track, a variety of track in the water adventure back and forth switch, take you to enjoy a different style of water.

What are you waiting for? Come and join this crazy water slide game and enjoy this water adventure!
Download Water Adventure Sliding and enjoy the most exciting water slide rush ! 🏊
